page.title: 13Golspie-A craft industry.
page.content: One of our more interesting craft shops in our village is the Orcadian Stone Company.It has a wide range of stones,minerals and gems from all over the world.Some of us think that it has a better display than the Natural History Museum in London.The whole shop is laid out in a display,with many stones and fossils in-laid in the walls.We enjoy looking at the giant amethyst,the agates,jasper,quartz crystals,corals and the weird kidney ore.Some of the stones are very thinly sliced allowing the light to shine through and illuminating the beautiful rock colours.There are workshops there where you can see polishing,slicing and cutting.
